p.em: "A deck of cards is 52 opportunities for a betrayal. I only need one."

description.p: You blend arcane infusion with sleight of hand, turning playing cards into deadly weapons.

p.em: "Pick a card. Any card. It'll be the last thing you see."

description.p: At 3rd level, you gain proficiency with playing cards. You treat playing cards as simple ranged weapons with the finesse and thrown properties (range 30/60). On a hit, they deal 1d6 slashing damage. These cards count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance.

p.em: "Hearts for burning passion, Spades for the grave."

description.p: At 3rd level, your Sneak Attack is infused with the magic of the suits. When you deal Sneak Attack damage with a playing card, roll a d4 to determine a bonus effect:

ul.li: 1 (Hearts): Deal extra fire damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
2 (Clubs): The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC = 8 + Prof + Cha) or be pushed 10 feet away.
3 (Diamonds): Deal extra force damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
4 (Spades): The target cannot regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: Sneak Attack triggers Suit effect (Roll d4).

p.em: "You can't read a face that isn't there."

description.p: At 9th level, you become impossible to read. You are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts, determine whether you are lying, or know your alignment. You can also perfectly palm Small or smaller objects, making them impossible to detect on your person without a physical search.

sheet.description: Immune to mind reading/truth detection. Perfect palming.

p.em: "I think it's time we switched seats."

description.p: At 13th level, you can manipulate positioning on the battlefield. As a bonus action, you can throw a card at a creature within 30 feet. The target must make a Charisma saving throw (DC = 8 + Prof + Cha).

ul.li: Failure: You and the target instantly swap places.
Success: You instantly teleport to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target.

description.p: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once). You regain expended uses on a long rest.

sheet.description: Throw card (30 ft). Cha Save. Fail: Swap places. Success: Teleport next to them.

p.em: "Let's see how you handle a bad beat."

description.p: At 17th level, you can unleash your entire deck in a storm of blades. As an action, you spray cards in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + Prof + Dex).
You can choose one creature who failed the save to apply your Sneak Attack damage to. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: 30 ft Cone. 8d6 Slash + 8d6 Force. Apply Sneak Attack to one.
